scripts.test: npm run prereport && npx cypress run --spec 'cypress/e2e/2test.spec.js'; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.mochawesome:merge: npx mochawesome-merge "cypress/results/mochawesome/*.json" > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
scripts.cypress:run: npm run prereport && npx cypress run
scripts.cypress:e2e: npm run cypress:run; npm run junit:merge; npm run mochawesome:merge
scripts.cy:run_para_e2e: npm run cy:run_e2e --browser firefox --ci-build-id 1 & npm run cy:run_e2e --browser chrome --ci-build-id 1
scripts.cy:run_browser: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser webkit --group Webkit --ci-build-id 1 & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id 1
scripts.cy:run_jenkins: npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser firefox --group firefox  & npm run cy:run_spec -- --browser chrome --group Chrome
scripts.cy:run_suite: npx cypress run --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd --browser webkit --group Webkit --ci-build-id 1 & npx cypress run --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd --browser chrome --group Chrome --ci-build-id 1 & npx cypress run --record --key f14b6f35-801a-4b0b-87ee-345aebb9babd --browser firefox --group Firefox --ci-build-id 1
